item.title:
您认为自己是在一家领先的专利律师事务所工作吗？
英国《金融时报》和 Statista 正在征集《欧洲领先专利律师事务所特别报告》的参选者。我们邀请客户和同行推荐律师事务所，并对其专业技能进行评分。
item.description:
Do you think you work at a leading patent law firm?

The FT and Statista are calling for entries for their Europe's Leading Patent Law Firms Special Report. Clients and peers are invited to recommend firms and rate them for specialist expertise on.ft.com/48vOLWe
